title: Business simulator game for designing smart devices with research, competitors, office upgrades, and cloud saves

requirements.text: Create the core game shell UI with navigation for: Dashboard, Device Studio (create devices), Research, Competitors/Market, Office, Investments, and Cloud Saves.

quotes: Make a game that allows you to Create smartphones ,tablets,watches and smart-glasses from scratch by selecting the desired characteristics and design.

acceptanceCriteria: App loads to a playable home/dashboard screen with clear navigation to all major sections listed in the requirement.
Each section renders a distinct page/panel with placeholder content where deeper features are implemented in later requirements.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Implement a device creation system that lets the player create smartphones, tablets, watches, and smart-glasses from scratch by selecting characteristics (e.g., CPU tier, RAM, storage, display, battery, camera, materials) and a design option, then saving the device as a product blueprint.

quotes: Make a game that allows you to Create smartphones ,tablets,watches and smart-glasses from scratch by selecting the desired characteristics and design.

acceptanceCriteria: Device Studio supports selecting a device category (smartphone/tablet/watch/smart-glasses).
Player can configure a set of characteristics and choose a design variant.
A saved blueprint appears in a list of created blueprints and can be opened and edited.
Blueprint data persists across reloads for the same signed-in user (or locally for anonymous mode if implemented).

requirements.text: Add an R&D technology research system containing 3000+ technologies, with a searchable/browsable tech tree/list, research prerequisites, research time/cost, and effects that modify device characteristics and/or business efficiency.
acceptanceCriteria: The Research screen shows 3000+ technology entries (generated dataset is acceptable).
Technologies can be searched by name and filtered by category/tier.
A technology can only be researched if prerequisites are met.
Completing research updates the player's unlocked technologies and impacts at least one visible stat/effect in the UI.

requirements.text: Implement a challenging mode (difficulty setting) aimed at economic-strategy fans that changes economic parameters (e.g., starting cash, competitor strength, R&D costs, market volatility) and is selectable when starting a new game.

quotes: * Challenging mode for fans of economic strategies

acceptanceCriteria: New Game flow includes difficulty selection with at least: Normal and Challenging.
Challenging mode applies clearly documented parameter changes shown in the UI (e.g., higher costs and stronger competitors).
Difficulty choice is stored with the save and affects gameplay consistently after reload.

requirements.text: Implement competitor simulation with smart behavior: AI competitors automatically research technologies, develop products, and release them to the market over time, affecting market competition and player outcomes.

quotes: * Smart behavior of competitors, automatic development and release of products

acceptanceCriteria: Competitors list shows multiple AI companies with basic stats (cash/market share/active products).
At defined simulation steps (turn/day/week), competitors perform actions (research/develop/release) without player input.
Player can see a market feed/log of competitor releases and their impact on market conditions (even if simplified).

requirements.text: Add a product release and market loop: the player can take a saved blueprint, set pricing/production/marketing options, release it, and then observe sales/earnings over simulation time.

quotes: automatic development and release of products

acceptanceCriteria: A blueprint can be converted into a released product with configurable price (and at least one additional launch parameter).
After release, the product generates sales/earnings during simulation progression.
Dashboard shows cash and at least one market metric changing over time (e.g., revenue, market share, product rating).

requirements.text: Implement an in-game smartphone OS simulation that can be “run” on a virtual phone: provide a basic home screen, app launcher, settings, and at least two interactive built-in apps (e.g., Notes, Mail, Browser mock).

quotes: * The ability to run the OS on your gaming smartphone

acceptanceCriteria: From a device/product view, the user can open an OS simulation screen.
OS simulation includes a home screen, an app grid/launcher, and a settings screen.
At least two built-in apps are interactive (create/edit a note; browse mock pages; etc.).
OS simulation state is stored per save (e.g., created notes persist after reload).

requirements.text: Create an office improvement/progression system with 20 upgrade levels and a dedicated 3D office viewer; each level changes the office appearance using beautiful 3D models rendered with Three.js/React Three Fiber.

quotes: * 20 levels of office improvement with beautiful 3D models

acceptanceCriteria: Office screen displays current office level (1–20) and upgrade requirements/cost.
Upgrading increases the office level and persists in the save.
A 3D office viewer renders a scene that visibly changes across multiple levels (at least 5 distinct visual milestones initially, scalable to 20).
3D viewer includes basic camera controls (orbit/pan/zoom) and performs acceptably in browser.

requirements.text: Add business investment actions: buying companies, marketing spend, and paid employee search; each action must affect at least one simulated variable (cash, market share, product sales, R&D speed, staffing quality).

quotes: * Many ways to invest your money, including buying companies, marketing, paid employee search

acceptanceCriteria: Investments screen lists at least: Buy Company, Marketing Campaign, Paid Employee Search.
Each action deducts cash and produces a measurable effect visible in UI metrics within the simulation (immediate or over time).
Actions are recorded in a timeline/log for the current save.
All investment outcomes persist after reload.

requirements.text: Provide many device design variants (visual styles) for each device category and a design browser/selector within Device Studio.
acceptanceCriteria: Device Studio includes a design picker with multiple variants per category (smartphone/tablet/watch/smart-glasses).
Selecting a design updates a live preview (2D render or 3D model).
Design choices are saved in the blueprint and appear correctly when re-opened.

requirements.text: Implement cloud synchronization via Internet Identity: allow users to sign in and have their saves stored and retrievable across devices; include save slot management (create, rename, load, delete).
acceptanceCriteria: User can sign in with Internet Identity and see authentication state in the UI.
Signed-in users can create at least one cloud save slot and load it later.
Saves persist across page reloads and across browsers/devices when signed into the same identity.
User can rename and delete save slots.
Anonymous users either (a) are prompted to sign in for cloud saves or (b) use a clearly labeled local-only mode.

requirements.text: Define and apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, layout, and component styling) appropriate for a serious economic-strategy/business-simulator game, and apply it consistently across all screens (avoid blue/purple as the dominant palette).

quotes: Allows you to manage a business simulator game that is worth your attention and is a serious player among economic strategies.

acceptanceCriteria: UI uses a consistent design system (spacing, typography scale, buttons, cards, tables) across all screens.
Theme is suitable for an economic strategy game and does not use blue/purple as the dominant palette.
Key game metrics (cash, revenue, market share, R&D progress) are presented clearly and consistently.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not add external databases or third-party backend services; use canister stable storage for persistence.
Frontend must use React + TypeScript with Tailwind and React Query.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths; only compose/use them.
All user-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Implementing a real smartphone OS emulator or running third-party operating systems (only a game-like OS simulation UI is required).
Multiplayer, real-time chat, or WebSocket-based real-time systems.
Integration with external cloud providers or external account systems beyond Internet Identity.
Photorealistic AAA 3D environments; office 3D can be stylized and optimized for web.

required: Game logo mark in a clean tech-business style (logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide dashboard hero/banner illustration with a stylized office + devices scene (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
Set of 12 minimal monochrome UI icons for the main navigation (nav-icons-set.dim_1024x1024.png)
Device design preview sheet showing multiple silhouettes/angles for smartphone/tablet/watch/smart-glasses (device-design-sheet.dim_1600x900.png)
